Welcome to Krishi-Mitra

Your one-stop solution for modern and efficient farm management

About Krishi-Mitra

Krishi-Mitra is an innovative platform dedicated to empowering farmers by providing essential tools and resources to optimize agricultural activities. From finding the right manpower to renting farm equipment and predicting crop yields, we cover every aspect of farm management. Our goal is to help you achieve greater efficiency and productivity on your farm.

Worker Hiring Module

Seamlessly connect with local laborers through our Worker Hiring module. View profiles, filter by village, and hire workers for various agricultural tasks, ensuring you always have the right workforce at hand.

Crop Prediction Module

Make informed decisions with our Crop Prediction module, which leverages advanced machine learning to forecast crop yields based on parameters like soil type, weather, and historical data.

Weather Forecasting Module

Stay ahead of the weather with real-time, location-specific forecasts. Our Weather Forecasting module helps you plan your farming activities by providing accurate temperature, precipitation, and wind predictions.

Farm Equipment Rental

Easily find and rent farm equipment from nearby providers. Our Farm Equipment Rental module connects you with local equipment owners, offering a cost-effective solution to access the machinery you need without the burden of ownership.

Krishi-Mitra: Empowering Farmers, One Step at a Time.

); }; export default Home;
